constituent: hearing, house, dice, animal tracks, drop, rice, rice field, brains
heisigStory: The hearing referred to in this character relates to trials in the courts. The elements: house . . . dice.
koohiiStory1: At your divorce hearing the judge tells you to roll dice to see who keeps the house. ("I can´t believe what I´m hearing!" you say).
koohiiStory2: In the courthouse the judge decides your hearing with a roll of the dice.
words:
審議(しんぎ): deliberation
審査(しんさ): judging, inspection, examination, investigation
審判(しんばん): refereeing, trial, judgement, umpire, referee
不審(ふしん): incomplete understanding, doubt, question, distrust, suspicion, strangeness, infidelity
審判(しんぱん): refereeing, trial, judgement, umpire, referee
